mapper.select:
select DISTINCT we.id ,d.code eventType ,d.icon img ,d.name disasterName ,d.disaster_color disasterColor ,d.disaster_level disasterLevel ,o.organization_name organizationName ,we.msg_type msgType ,DATE_FORMAT(we.send_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') effective ,wec.content description ,we.instruction from warn_edit we LEFT JOIN disaster d on d.id = we.disaster_id LEFT JOIN organization o on o.id = we.organization_id LEFT JOIN warn_edit_content wec on wec.warn_edit_id = we.id
where DATE_FORMAT(we.send_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and status > 0
